faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Dive into the following questions to gain insights into the powerful features that WhoTeach offers and how it can elevate your training journey.

items.title: Why choose WhoTeach?
items.description: WhoTeach offers a comprehensive and customizable training experience with integrated artificial intelligence tools that enhance learning effectiveness and reduce the time needed to create quality content.

items.title: What do I need to start?
items.description: To get started with WhoTeach, you only need an internet connection and a device such as a computer, tablet, or smartphone. The platform is cloud-based, so it doesn't require complex installations.

items.title: How do I install WhoTeach?
items.description: WhoTeach is a cloud solution, so no installation is required. Once your account is activated, you can immediately access all features through any modern web browser.

items.title: Does WhoTeach support integrations with other systems?
items.description: Yes, WhoTeach offers APIs and connectors to integrate with HR systems, CRMs, SSO, and other business tools, allowing you to create a coherent and unified training ecosystem.

items.title: Can I start with just one module and add others in the future?
items.description: Absolutely. WhoTeach's philosophy is scalability: you can start with the modules you need right away and add others as your organization grows or your needs change.

items.title: What kind of support is included in the plans?
items.description: All WhoTeach plans include technical support via email. Advanced plans also include phone support, dedicated onboarding, and a personal account manager to help you get the most out of the platform.

stats.title: We have a concrete impact on organizations

hero.title: We help organizations grow, starting with people

vision.title: We want to rethink how training is done
vision.paragraph1: WhoTeach was born from an ambitious vision and an urgent need: to rethink how training is done. It all originates from a PhD thesis in Computer Science, where our CEO Francesco Epifania explores the potential of Artificial Intelligence applied to knowledge sharing.
vision.paragraph2: From there, the intuition transforms into a concrete project: a digital ecosystem for learning, developed within a European program and enriched by collaboration with universities and international partners.
vision.paragraph3: Today WhoTeach is much more than a platform: it's the B2B SaaS solution for corporate training, designed for those seeking a truly flexible, intelligent tool ready to evolve with the challenges of the working world.

belief.title: We believe that learning is the most solid competitive advantage
belief.paragraph1: We help companies, institutions, and trainers create and deliver high-quality educational paths, simplifying access to upskilling and reskilling opportunities.
belief.paragraph2: For us, training is not a cost to bear, but an investment that generates value over time. Because when people grow, organizations evolve.

ecosystem.title: An ecosystem for those who believe in continuous growth
ecosystem.paragraph1: Advanced technology, yes. But at the service of people. Because we believe that true innovation is what makes learning simpler, more accessible, and motivating, for both teachers and learners.
ecosystem.paragraph2: In a market that changes at the speed of skills, artificial intelligence is for us the key to reducing the gap, accelerating upskilling, and transforming training into a competitive advantage.

stats.title: We have a concrete impact on organizations

partners.title: Together with those who invest in the future
partners.paragraph1: We stand alongside businesses and institutions that believe in innovation as a lever for growth.
partners.paragraph2: We collaborate every day with training institutions and companies that have chosen our platform to transform training activities into evolved, scalable, and measurable digital experiences. A continuously expanding network, united by a common goal: making training a strategic asset for the future.
